#summary A list of SACD-R compatible players.

== Introduction ==

Raw ISO images (SACD-R) that are burned to DVD-R can be played on several SACD players. If your SACD player is not in this list please write an ISO to disc and give it a try.

==Confirmed to play==

  * Cambridge Audio Azur 650BD
  * Denon DVD-2910
  * Denon DVD-3910
  * Denon DVD-A11
  * Denon DBP-1611UD
  * Marantz DV7600
  * Marantz UD5005
  * NAD M5
  * NAD T585
  * OPPO BDP-80
  * OPPO BDP-83
  * OPPO BDP-83SE
  * OPPO BDP-93
  * OPPO BDP-95
  * Sony BDP-S370
  * Sony BDP-S380
  * Sony BDP-S470
  * Sony BDP-S570
  * Sony BDP-S870
  * Sony BDP-S970
  * Yamaha BD-S1067

==Confirmed to play after firmware update==

  * Samsung HD745/945/950
  * Samsung HD841/941
  * Yamaha DVD-S1800
  * Yamaha DVD-S2700
